name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Softonic Browser Games: Play free HTML games

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find top browser games like tetris, klondike solitaire, backgammon and bookmark them through the Softonic Browser Games extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Softonic Browser Games Chrome extension lets you save your favorite html games from our browser games catalog. Thanks to our extension it will be easier for you to quickly access the favorite games you have bookmarked from our site.

HOW TO USE SOFTONIC BROWSER GAMES EXTENSION
Our extension is very easy-to-use. Follow the instructions below:
1. Install the extension.
2. Visit and explore our Browser Games site: https://en.softonic.com/browser-games
3. Click on the ‚ÄúAdd to favorites button‚Äù. The browser game will be automatically added to your favorite list of games in the extension. 
4. Open the extension anytime to access directly to your favorite browser games.
Have fun! üëæ
